title: Early Access
content:
o have a taste of what the game could be while giving developers feedback in terms of what could be improved, and what could be added. Additionally, playing Early Access should mean that you are alright with being spoiled at the beginning of the game's story. All that being said, if you are the type to want to contribute towards being able to play an amazing game, or you simply want to scratch the D&D itch early on, then Early Access is for you.
